column5: Thinking about taking my 16 your old son to Canada for his first trip. Has anyone used this outfitter? How was the fishing and the accomadations?
Whyner, I've stayed in the Atikokan area at least 1/2 dz. times. Don't recall hearing about this outfitter. Is it possible they also go by another name?
http://www.seineriverlodge.com/atiko...hing-lakes.htm I fished Calm lake a few times and we did very well. Nice country.
